translations: 下面结构；永久性军事设施；基础设施，基础建设

phrs.translation: 基础设施；基础设施建设

sentences.sentence: Although South Africa has many of the attributes of the First World – some good infrastructure, millions of rich people – it is still not part of that world.
sentences.translation: 尽管南非具有第一世界的很多特征-良好的基础设施，成千上万的富翁-但它还并不属于那个世界。

sentences.sentence: Simple improve we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s to infrastructure can reduce the spread of disease.
sentences.translation: 对基础设施的简单改进可以减少疾病的传播。

sentences.sentence: The key to seamlessness rests in infrastructure and information sharing.
sentences.translation: 无缝的关键在于基础设施和信息共享。
